snippet.title: Ruza - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Ruza is a free RPG where you lead a group of misfits to stop a monster, a vile reindeer!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2177620/Ruza/
Itch.io: https://stroj.itch.io/ruza
Twitter: https://twitter.com/strojdev
Website: https://stroj.dev/
